UniprotID	Q9NWB1
Accession	Q9NWB1;Q7Z7I7;Q8TAE3;Q8TAF2;Q8WYB2;Q9NS20
EntryName	RFOX1_HUMAN
ProteinName	RNA binding protein fox-1 homolog 1 (Ataxin-2-binding protein 1) (Fox-1 homolog A) (Hexaribonucleotide-binding protein 1)
GeneName	RBFOX1 A2BP A2BP1 FOX1 HRNBP1
Length	397
Function	RNA-binding protein that regulates alternative splicing events by binding to 5'-UGCAUGU-3' elements. Regulates alternative splicing of tissue-specific exons and of differentially spliced exons during erythropoiesis.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm
